title: Hurricane Beryl kills seven as it churns towards Jamaica
content: Hurricane Beryl churned towards Jamaica Tuesday, with forecasters warning of potentially deadly winds and storm surge, after the storm killed at least seven people and caused widespread destruction across the southeastern Caribbean. As of 2300 GMT, Beryl had maximum sustained winds of 150 miles (240 kilometers) per hour as it headed towards Jamaica and the Cayman Islands on Tuesday, according to the NHC. A hurricane watch and tropical storm warnings have also been issued for parts of Haiti.
summary: Hurricane Beryl churned towards Jamaica Tuesday, with forecasters warning of potentially deadly winds and storm surge, after the storm killed at least seven people and caused widespread destruction across the southeastern Caribbean. As of 2300 GMT, Beryl had maximum sustained winds of 150 miles (240 kilometers) per hour as it headed towards Jamaica and the Cayman Islands on Tuesday, according to the NHC. A hurricane watch and tropical storm warnings have also been issued for parts of Haiti.

title: Astronaut who clicked iconic 'Earthrise' photo died while doing Flyby
content: According to the NTSB report, Anders had informed his friend via text message about his intention to conduct a flyby near her residence on the western shore of Orcas Island. The friend stated that such flybys were not uncommon for Anders, who typically performed two passes and occasionally rocked the airplane's wings but "he never performed any kind of aerobatic maneuvers.”
summary: According to the NTSB report, Anders had informed his friend via text message about his intention to conduct a flyby near her residence on the western shore of Orcas Island. The friend stated that such flybys were not uncommon for Anders, who typically performed two passes and occasionally rocked the airplane's wings but "he never performed any kind of aerobatic maneuvers.”

title: Chinese firms eye Morocco as way to cash in on US electric vehicle subsidies
Rage, sadness, frustration: Turmoil in the White House over Joe Biden
content: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday acknowledged his performance during last Thursday's presidential debate wasn't his best, but blamed it on jet lag after two overseas trips earlier in June. Biden has faced mounting questions about his 2024 reelection bid after last week's shaky debate performance, with one House of Representatives fellow Democrat on Tuesday publicly calling on him to withdraw from the race. Speaking at a campaign event in McLean, Virginia, on Tuesday evening, Biden admitted the debate against former President Donald Trump, his Republican rival, did not go well.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday acknowledged his performance during last Thursday's presidential debate wasn't his best, but blamed it on jet lag after two overseas trips earlier in June. Biden has faced mounting questions about his 2024 reelection bid after last week's shaky debate performance, with one House of Representatives fellow Democrat on Tuesday publicly calling on him to withdraw from the race. Speaking at a campaign event in McLean, Virginia, on Tuesday evening, Biden admitted the debate against former President Donald Trump, his Republican rival, did not go well.

title: China seizes Taiwanese fishing boat, warns Taiwan not to interfere
content: Tensions rise as Chinese maritime enforcement persists near Kinmen following the deaths of two Chinese fishermen. President Lai Ching-te's term sees increased pressure from China, prompting Taiwan to seek communication for detained fishermen's release.
summary: Tensions rise as Chinese maritime enforcement persists near Kinmen following the deaths of two Chinese fishermen. President Lai Ching-te's term sees increased pressure from China, prompting Taiwan to seek communication for detained fishermen's release.

title: Hurricane Beryl claims 5 lives, weakens to category 4 but remains 'extremely dangerous'
Debate with Trump: Biden reveals why he 'nearly fell asleep on stage'
Hurricane Beryl, churning toward Jamaica, threatens Haiti and Dominican Republic
content: Hurricane Beryl, a Category 4 storm, poses a threat to Jamaica, Hispaniola, Haiti's Port-au-Prince, and the Cayman Islands. Prime Minister Ralph Gonsalves reports severe damage on Union Island. Prime Minister Dickon Mitchell emphasizes the destruction on Carriacou and Petite Martinique. Scientist Christopher Rozoff attributes Beryl's rapid intensification to high North Atlantic temperatures.
summary: Hurricane Beryl, a Category 4 storm, poses a threat to Jamaica, Hispaniola, Haiti's Port-au-Prince, and the Cayman Islands. Prime Minister Ralph Gonsalves reports severe damage on Union Island. Prime Minister Dickon Mitchell emphasizes the destruction on Carriacou and Petite Martinique. Scientist Christopher Rozoff attributes Beryl's rapid intensification to high North Atlantic temperatures.

title: Boris Johnson makes surprise late move to avert Tory wipeout
content: Boris Johnson made a surprise appearance on Tuesday night to urge Conservative voters to prevent Labour from achieving a landslide victory in the upcoming UK general election. In an unscheduled speech in central London, Johnson, who is not running as a Tory candidate, warned that a Labour government with a significant majority would undo Conservative achievements.
summary: Boris Johnson made a surprise appearance on Tuesday night to urge Conservative voters to prevent Labour from achieving a landslide victory in the upcoming UK general election. In an unscheduled speech in central London, Johnson, who is not running as a Tory candidate, warned that a Labour government with a significant majority would undo Conservative achievements.

title: China is building and testing lethal attack drones for Russia
content: Chinese and Russian companies are reportedly developing an attack drone similar to Iran's Shahed model, which has been used in Ukraine, according to European officials. This collaboration began in 2023 and has progressed to development and testing stages, with the intention of shipping the drones to Russia. The Chinese drones have not yet been deployed in Ukraine.
summary: Chinese and Russian companies are reportedly developing an attack drone similar to Iran's Shahed model, which has been used in Ukraine, according to European officials. This collaboration began in 2023 and has progressed to development and testing stages, with the intention of shipping the drones to Russia. The Chinese drones have not yet been deployed in Ukraine.

title: Russia's Novorossiysk authorities limit beach access after sea drones attacks
content: Russia has often accused Ukraine of attacking its port cities on the Black Sea coast and on the Moscow-annexed Crimean Peninsula, but Russian officials often do not disclose the full extent of damage inflicted by Ukrainian attacks.
summary: Russia has often accused Ukraine of attacking its port cities on the Black Sea coast and on the Moscow-annexed Crimean Peninsula, but Russian officials often do not disclose the full extent of damage inflicted by Ukrainian attacks.

title: Malaysia court dismisses jailed ex-PM Najib's bid to serve sentence under house arrest
content: Former PM Najib Razak's bid for house arrest denied by Malaysian court, pushing for execution of royal order in 1MDB scandal case.
summary: Former PM Najib Razak's bid for house arrest denied by Malaysian court, pushing for execution of royal order in 1MDB scandal case.

title: Harris has better chance than Biden in US Prez elections: Poll

Haiti PM vows 'transparency' to population traumatized by gangs
content: Garry Conille returns as Haiti's prime minister, pledging transparency and cooperation amid gang violence and infrastructural collapse. With a UN background, he focuses on immediate security with international support while reinforcing local police. Conille aims to rebuild trust, address crises, and organize elections by 2026, emphasizing transparency and structured progress for a successful transition.
summary: Garry Conille returns as Haiti's prime minister, pledging transparency and cooperation amid gang violence and infrastructural collapse. With a UN background, he focuses on immediate security with international support while reinforcing local police. Conille aims to rebuild trust, address crises, and organize elections by 2026, emphasizing transparency and structured progress for a successful transition.

title: Plans to demolish Texas church draw visitors back to sanctuary

Salman Rushdie's stabber rejects plea deal involving terrorism charge with lesser jail term
content: Hadi Matar, the 26-year-old accused of stabbing author Salman Rushdie in 2022, has declined a plea deal on Tuesday that would have lowered his state prison sentence but could lead to a federal terrorism-related charge, according to his attorney, Nathaniel Barone. Matar remains in custody without bail following the attack that took place as Rushdie was preparing to speak at the Chautauqua Institution in western New York. Rushdie suffered significant injuries, including blindness in one eye and over a dozen stab wounds.
summary: Hadi Matar, the 26-year-old accused of stabbing author Salman Rushdie in 2022, has declined a plea deal on Tuesday that would have lowered his state prison sentence but could lead to a federal terrorism-related charge, according to his attorney, Nathaniel Barone. Matar remains in custody without bail following the attack that took place as Rushdie was preparing to speak at the Chautauqua Institution in western New York. Rushdie suffered significant injuries, including blindness in one eye and over a dozen stab wounds.
